item.title: SC/ST Special Court Acquits Gadwal Family in False Caste-Based Complaint Case
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The SC/ST Special Court has dismissed a false complaint case and acquitted the accused, upholding their innocence.
The case involved Potula Janardhana Reddy, a retired director from Aija Municipality, and his family, who were accused by his relatives of harassment and caste-based abuse over a property dispute. The dispute originated in May 2010, when Janardhana Reddy began a land pooja at his property located at House No. 7-63/1 in Gurram Thota. Despite an injunction issued by the Gadwa...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
